Legal_Issue: Misapprehension of claim, confusion between state protection and Internal Flight Alternative (IFA)
Credibility_Assessment: Board accepted the applicant's story as credible
Evidence_Type: Personal testimony, lack of evidence on state protection failure and IFA unreasonableness
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Existence of a viable Internal Flight Alternative in Walvis Bay
Application_Error: Alleged misapprehension of facts by the Board
Legal_Standard: Burden of proof on applicant to show risk of persecution and rebut presumption of state protection
Application_Factor: Failure to provide convincing evidence against state protection or IFA viability
Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the Board confused state protection with IFA
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA, principles of refugee determination including IFA and state protection
Cause_of_Refusal: Applicant failed to demonstrate no viable Internal Flight Alternative and insufficient evidence of persecution risk
Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of evidence to rebut state protection; insufficient proof of danger in proposed IFA location
Credibility_Issues: Not found; applicantâ€™s story was accepted
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim that Board misapprehended evidence regarding IFA and state protection
